    Publications

    Journal Articles

    1. J. Cagan, K. Kotovsky, and C. McComb "Are Teams Teams? And Other Musings on Humpty Dumpty"s Use of Language In The Design World." Submitted to Journal of Mechanical Design.
    2. T. Maier, J. DeFranco, and C. McComb "Us Versus Me: An Analysis of Team Process and Performance in Distributed Data Science Challenges." Submitted to Journal of Empirical Software engineering.
    3. M. Alzayed, C. McComb, S. Hunter, and S. Miller "Helping Teams Expand the Breadth of Their Solution Space Through Product Dissection: A Simulation Based Investigation." Submitted to Journal of Mechanical Design.
    4. T. Mahan, N. Meisel, C. McComb, and J. Menold (2018). "Pulling at the Digital Thread: Exploring the Tolerance Stack Up Between Automatic Procedures and Expert Strategies in Scan To Print Processes." Journal of Mechanical Design.
    5. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2018). "Data on the Design of Truss Structures by Teams of Engineering Students." Data in Brief.
    6. C. McComb, N.G. Johnson, P.S. Santaeufemia, B.T. Gorman, B. Kolste, A. Mobley, and K. Shimada (2018). "Multi-Objective Optimization and Scenario-based Robustness Analysis of the Moneymaker Hip Pump." Journal of Development Engineering.
    7. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2017). "Data on the Configuration Design of Internet-Connected Home Cooling Systems by Engineering Students." Data in Brief, vol. 14, pp. 773-776.
    8. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2017). "Mining Process Heuristics from Designer Action Data via Hidden Markov Models." Journal of Mechanical Design.
    9. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2017). "Capturing Human Sequence-Learning Abilities in Configuration Design Tasks through Markov Chains." Journal of Mechanical Design, vol. 139(9), pp. 1-12.
    10. C. McComb, K. Goucher-Lamber, and J. Cagan (2017). "Impossible by Design? Fairness, Strategy, and Arrow's Impossibility Theorem." Design Science, vol. 3(2).
    11. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2017). "Optimizing Design Teams Based on Problem Properties: Computational Team Simulations and an Applied Empirical Test." Journal of Mechanical Design, vol. 139(4), pp. 1-12.
    12. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2016). "Drawing Inspiration From Human Design Teams for Better Search and Optimization: The Heterogeneous Simulated Annealing Teams Algorithm." Journal of Mechanical Design, vol. 138(4), pp. 1-6.
    13. C. McComb, and F.M. Tehrani (2015). "Enhancing Shear Transfer in Composite Decks." Engineering Structures, vol. 88, pp. 251-261.
    14. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2015). "Rolling with the Punches: An Examination of Team Performance in a Design Task Subject to Drastic Changes." Design Studies, vol. 36, pp. 99-121.
    15. C. McComb, J. Cagan, and K. Kotovsky (2015). "Lifting the Veil: Drawing insights about design teams from a cognitively-inspired computational model." Design Studies, vol. 40(C), pp. 119-142.
